title: r/Pettyrevenge Spoiled Brat Left His Toys All Over My Yard... So I Threw Them Away!
description: r/Pettyrevenge OP's neighbors are your typical nightmare neighbors. The kids are spoiled brats who treat OP's property as if it belongs to them, and they leave their toys scattered all over OP's yard. One day, the kids just to happen to leave their bike where OP normally leaves behind his trash. Should OP tell the kids that the sanitation workers might throw away their bike? Nah!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
